info.name: GogoAnime - Anime - Blue Haze
info.description: Want a better experience for GogoAnime Well then here you go! This will completely remove the yellow theme, it removes ads and improves video performance, it's fully compatible for the GogoAnime.[Io][Tv][Es]+[Mobile] sites + it comes with a sweet selection of wallpapers, you can also choose how many video players you want. This style is used best with Ghostery + Adblockplus.
info.additionalInfo: Status: Complete - Maintenance: 3 Update details - tweaks logo fixed. new ad black box removed. Tip: Don't upload wallpapers from computer, upload them on imgur and then copy its image address here. Make sure to try my other userstyles: https://userstyles.org/users/299934 Want more backgrounds? get image addresses from my Imgur album 1. http://imgur.com/gallery/cjlih

data.title: Could you add a new domain
